OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_SCOPE.description: The scope of the connector, e.g. 'flashpoint'.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

CONNECTOR_LIVE_STREAM_ID.description: The ID of the live stream to connect to.

CONNECTOR_LIVE_STREAM_LISTEN_DELETE.description: Whether to listen for delete events on the live stream.

CONNECTOR_LIVE_STREAM_NO_DEPENDENCIES.description: Whether to ignore dependencies when processing events from the live stream.

MICROSOFT_SENTINEL_INTEL_TENANT_ID.description: Your Azure App Tenant ID, see the screenshot to help you find this information.

MICROSOFT_SENTINEL_INTEL_CLIENT_ID.description: Your Azure App Client ID, see the screenshot to help you find this information.

MICROSOFT_SENTINEL_INTEL_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Your Azure App Client secret, See the screenshot to help you find this information.

MICROSOFT_SENTINEL_INTEL_WORKSPACE_NAME.description: The name of the log analytics workspace

MICROSOFT_SENTINEL_INTEL_SUBSCRIPTION_ID.description: The subscription id where the Log Analytics is

MICROSOFT_SENTINEL_INTEL_RESOURCE_GROUP.description: The name of the resource group where the log analytics is

MICROSOFT_SENTINEL_INTEL_SOURCE_SYSTEM.description: The name of the source system displayed in Microsoft Sentinel

MICROSOFT_SENTINEL_INTEL_DELETE_EXTENSIO.description: Delete the extensions in the stix bundle sent to the SIEM

MICROSOFT_SENTINEL_INTEL_EXTRA_LABELS.description: Extra labels added to the bundle sent. String separated by comma

MICROSOFT_SENTINEL_INTEL_WORKSPACE_API_V.description: API version of the Microsoft log analytics workspace interface

MICROSOFT_SENTINEL_INTEL_MANAGEMENT_API_.description: API version of the Microsoft management interface
